data.eml:eml: Three new species of Grylloblatta Walker (Insecta: Grylloblattodea: Grylloblattidae), from southern Oregon and northern California

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Schoville, Sean D. (2012): Three new species of Grylloblatta Walker (Insecta: Grylloblattodea: Grylloblattidae), from southern Oregon and northern California. Zootaxa 3412: 42-52, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.212975
